SEARCH
Package midtermlabproject3

Class Node

java.lang.Object
midtermlabproject3.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Node>
public class Node extends Object implements Comparable<Node>
Huffman Node Class representing each node in the Huffman tree. Each node contains a character, its frequency, and references to its left and right child nodes.
Author:
Hyowon Arzil Bernabe

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Node(char data, int frequency)
    Constructor for leaf nodes (nodes with a character).
    Node(int frequency, Node leftNode, Node rightNode)
    Constructor for internal nodes (nodes without a character, but with left and right children).

    • Node

      public Node(int frequency, Node leftNode, Node rightNode)
      Constructor for internal nodes (nodes without a character, but with left and right children).
      Parameters:
      frequency - the frequency of this internal node
      leftNode - the left child node
      rightNode - the right child node

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Node node)
      Compares this node's frequency with another node's frequency.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Node>
      Parameters:
      node - the node to compare with
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this node's frequency is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified node's frequency

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Checks if this node is a leaf node (i.e., it has no children).
      Returns:
      true if this node is a leaf, false otherwise
